bibl.title: The Ancient Title of the Ad Demonicum.
bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. - I. End title of a roll, second century A.D. This title is also to be restored in P. Berol. Inv. 8935 (= Pack2 1244) [edd.: Wolfgang Müller and Günter Poethke, ArchPF 27 (1980) p. 17]. - II. Book title or "sillybos", late third or early fourth century.
Stephens Susan A., The Ancient Title of the Ad Demonicum.
Naphtali Lewis (Ed.), Papyrology = YCS 28 (1985) pp. 5-8 et pl. II.
